    • Constructor Detail

      • Plesiosaurs

        public Plesiosaurs(java.lang.String name,
                   int age)
        Constructor. All young Plesiosaurs are represented by a '2' and have 50 hit points. Young Plesiosaurs starting food level is 10 and their maximum food level is 50.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this Plesiosaurs
